name: Mecha Saga: origins
description:
The prequel story to the upcoming Board Game Mecha Saga: the war inside.

Sign Up for free access to Origins and receive Mecha Saga updates HERE

Kickstart your Mecha Legends' motivations and strategies in this interactive fiction.

"...the battles between unity and autonomy, grudges and idealism, peace and domination gave rise to the factions that defined THE MECHA SAGA"

Which faction will you join, control, and revolutionize?

Chapter 1 Complete. Chapter 2 is coming soon.
